name: HelloLeads CRM Form Shortcode
author: HelloLeads

sections.description:
This Plugin is used for showing all the HelloLeads CRM form into your wordpress and make the shortcode of that form so that you can use that shortcode anywhere in to you wordpress page. You just need to configure your setting via entering your email and token provided in HelloLeads account.

3rd Party HelloLeads

This plugin will get all the CRM form in to your wordpress from HelloLeads CRM. All you need to create an account on HelloLeads and you will get all the credentials that this plugin is need to communicate with HelloLeads CRM API. You are requested to please visit the below URL for privacy policy and data security.

https://www.helloleads.io/privacy/

https://www.helloleads.io/terms/

https://www.helloleads.io/security/
sections.faq:
How To Connect HelloLeads CRM Form

Just enter your email and token key and click on connect button.

Where Is My HelloLeads Form Shortcode

You just need to visit the HLS CRM Form List menu and you will see all the form created into Helloleads CRM with their shortcode click on the copy icon for copying the shortcode and use anywhere into your page or post.

screenshots.caption: Screen as per shown in this screenshot is used for connecting the HelloLead CRM via credentials email and token

After connected, you will see all the HelloLeads Leads Form with their shortcode as well via visiting the menu HLS CRM Form List. From there you can copy any shortcode via clicking copy icon and use in any page or post.
